TextStringDefinition.TextString: Đạt Cấp độ Xã hội 3
{0.SimFirstName}'s creative faculties are progressing nicely!
Đạt Cấp độ Xã hội 6
Talk with Giant Stuffed Animal will now reduce sadness. Also, {0.SimFirstName} can Research Idioms at a Computer.
Đạt Cấp độ Xã hội 7
{0.SimFirstName} can now Talk about School with other Sims.
Đạt Cấp độ Vận động 5
{0.SimFirstName} can now Hangout on the Monkey Bars.
Đạt Cấp độ Vận động 2
{0.SimFirstName}'s Motor skill is improving nicely!
Đạt Cấp độ Vận động 9
{0.SimFirstName} will sometimes get more Motor Skill from the Monkey Bars, and Playing Games on a Motion Gaming Rig or Computer.
Đạt Cấp độ Vận động 3
{0.SimFirstName}'s new skill in Knitting will allow {0.SimPronounObjective} to create amazing stitched artwork. The higher the skill level, the more knittables {M0.he}{F0.she} can knit.
Đạt Cấp độ Đan 6
{0.SimFirstName} can now knit Poufs. What is a Pouf? Knit one and find out!
Đạt Cấp độ Đan 3
{0.SimFirstName} can now knit Furnishings. Mailboxes with cozies, and plant holders for everyone... huzzah!

Anyone can cook, but Sims who are epicurious will benefit from spending a little extra time and attention in the kitchen.

Cooking skill is built primarily by cooking with the fridge, stove, and counter. Increasing this skill will unlock new Cooking Tricks, Moodlets, and Recipes.

Homestyle Cooking can be mentored at Skill level 5 from a Fridge, Stove, or Oven.
Đạt Cấp độ Nấu ăn 2
{0.SimFirstName} learned the recipes for Eggs and Toast, BLT, Chips and Salsa, and Fish Tacos. {M0.He}{F0.She} also learned a cool new Combo Add trick move.
\n{0.SimPronounSubjective|xxUpper} can also Mentor others in Homestyle Cooking.
Đạt Cấp độ Nấu ăn 7
{0.SimFirstName} learned the recipe for Blackened Bass and Omelet.
Đạt Cấp độ Nấu ăn 6
{0.SimFirstName} learned the recipe for Blue Confetti Cake and Chili. {M0.He}{F0.She} also learned some cool new trick moves.
Đạt Cấp độ Nấu ăn 4
{0.SimFirstName} learned the recipe for Spaghetti and Strawberry Cake.
Đạt Cấp độ Nấu ăn 9
{0.SimFirstName} learned the recipe for Chicken Stir Fry and Cioppino. {M0.He}{F0.She} can also Give Cooking Tips to other Sims.
Đạt Cấp độ Nấu ăn 10
{0.SimFirstName} learned the recipes for Roast Chicken and Tuna Casserole.
Acquired the Cooking skill
{0.SimFirstName}'s new skill in Cooking will allow {0.SimPronounObjective} to prepare delicious, straight forward classics. Yum! The higher the skill level, the more recipes become unlocked.
Đạt Cấp độ Nấu ăn 5
{0.SimFirstName} learned the recipe for French Toast and Fish and Chips. {M0.He}{F0.She} also unlocked the Gourmet Cooking skill and will receive the Competent Cook Moodlet when cooking.
Đạt Cấp độ Nấu ăn 8
{0.SimFirstName} learned the recipe for Apple Pie. {M0.He}{F0.She} can also Flavorize a meal to make it higher quality.
Đạt Cấp độ Nấu ăn 3
{0.SimFirstName} learned the recipes for Pan Fried Tilapia, Chocolate Chip Cookies, and Pancakes. {M0.He}{F0.She} can also Talk about Cooking with other Sims.

Do it yourself! That's the motto of a handy Sim. Handy Sims aren't afraid to repair things when they break, can upgrade regular household objects, and may even dabble with a bit of woodworking.

Handiness is built by repairing and upgrading objects, or using the woodworking table. Increasing this skill unlocks new craftables on the Woodworking Table and improves Sims' ability to Repair and Upgrade objects.

Handiness can be mentored at Skill level 5 from a Woodworking Table or when Sims are upgrading or repairing various objects.
Đạt Cấp độ Khéo léo 2

{0.SimFirstName} can now perform Basic Upgrades on Plumbing objects and Craft Furniture at a Woodworking Table. {M0.He}{F0.She} can also Talk about Handiness with other Sims and Purchase Upgrade Parts on the Computer!
\n{0.SimPronounSubjective|xxUpper} can also Mentor others in Handiness.
Đạt Cấp độ Khéo léo 9
{0.SimFirstName} can now perform Advanced Upgrades on electronic objects. {M0.He}{F0.She} can also craft Tubs on the Woodworking Table.
Đạt Cấp độ Khéo léo 7
{0.SimFirstName} can now Upgrade plumbing objects twice as fast. {M0.He}{F0.She} can also perform Advanced Upgrades on kitchen objects.
Đạt Cấp độ Khéo léo 4
{0.SimFirstName} can now perform Advanced Upgrades on Plumbing objects. {M0.He}{F0.She} can also Craft End Tables at the Woodworking Table.
